subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The United States blew a three-goal lead in the third period and lost, 6-5, in overtime to Sweden at the world championship Wednesday. The point from the overtime loss was enough for the Americans to win Group C and avoid facing Russia 18 hours later in a second-round match on the same rink in Bern, Switzerland.
